Fire Safety Equipment

These are the things that is recommended in your houses to be prepared for possible outbreak of fire.

Smoke Alarm

Install smoke alarms in rooms, kitchens, and other living areas. These are set to alert you when household fires are still in a controllable state.

Fire Extinguisher

Not all kinds of fire can be extinguished with water, so they are classified into types.

Types of Fire

Fire Class: Material Type: Examples:
A Light materials Paper, plastic, wood, leaves
B Flammable liquids Kerosone, paint, solvents, adhesives
C Energized electrical equipment Plugged appliances and tools
D Combustible metals Sodium, Zinc, Potassium
K Cooking fuels and oils Frying oil, LPG

Emergency Exit Plan

It is highly recommended that every family have their own emergency exit plan. Be sure that every member of the family knows and understands the exit route and the meeting place outside your house. Have fire drills to get the entire family involved.
